Let's learn some words used when flying.
They caught the red-eye to New York.
Airlines treat their frequent fliers very well.
They couldn't close the luggage compartment.
You have to go through passport control before boarding the plane.
You can sell your dollars at the currency exchange.
The fasten seat belt sign is on.
The airline's in-flight entertainment includes a few movies.
Flights are overbooked because airlines want more profit.
